content.text: I recently graduated from college and I'm looking for a job in marketing. I'm really excited to start my career.
Congrats on graduating! What was your major?
I majored in business administration with a focus on marketing.
Oh, nice! I have a friend who majored in business administration too. What do you want to do with your marketing degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still exploring my options. I'm interested in working for a marketing agency, but I'm also open to other possibilities.
I think that's great. It's important to keep your options open.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family. I also like playing sports and going to concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like going to concerts too. Do you have any favorite bands or artists?
I like a lot of different bands and artists. I'm a big fan of country music.
Oh, nice! I like country music too. Who are some of your favorite country artists?
I like a lot of different country artists, but some of my favorites are Luke Bryan, Jason Aldean, and Miranda Lambert.
I like those artists too! They're all really good.
